text: @AltRightActivist: "The energy crisis in Europe is a perfect example of how our politically correct policies are harming our nations. We're dependent on Russian gas and oil, but we're too afraid to admit it. The prices are skyrocketing and it's hurting our people. It's time to stop being held hostage by these globalist elites and their agendas. Let's take back control of our energy and our destiny!
